Requirement.formula: #program; var buildingInstance = Land::getFirstInstanceOfObject(Building::find('RonaldReaganReeducationCenter')); if(!isNULL(buildingInstance)) { return Object::getProperty(buildingInstance, 'GridType') != 6; } return false;
